label: Seasonal Cleanup
title: Seasonal cleanups that reset your garden properly
description: A focused tidy-up that clears the mess, brings things back under control, and sets your garden up for the season ahead.

hero.imageAlt: Garden looking tidy after a seasonal cleanup and reset
hero.caption: A proper reset makes everything feel easier to manage.

included.label: What’s included
included.title: A clear, practical reset for the season
included.description: We’ll focus on the work that makes the biggest difference: clearing, cutting back, tidying structure, and leaving a clean finish.

items.title: General clear-out
items.description: Remove the built-up mess so the garden feels usable again.

items.title: Cut back & tidy
items.description: A sensible prune and tidy for a cleaner shape.

items.title: Bed cleanup
items.description: Clear and tidy borders so everything looks sharper.

items.title: Edges and borders
items.description: Crisp lines that make the garden feel more finished.

items.title: Season-aware plan
items.description: Practical advice for what to do next and when.

results.label: Recent results
results.title: From messy to manageable
results.description: A seasonal reset makes ongoing upkeep easier and the whole space feel more presentable.

cards.title: Clearer beds and borders
cards.description: A reset that makes the garden feel lighter and cleaner.
cards.imageAlt: Garden after a cleanup with tidy borders

cards.title: Sharper structure
cards.description: A tidy-up that makes hedges, edges, and shapes feel more intentional.
cards.imageAlt: Tidy garden structure with neat hedges and lawn

cards.title: Ready for the season

valueBand.label: Value
valueBand.title: A reset that makes the whole garden feel better
valueBand.description: Seasonal cleanups are about momentum: once it’s tidy again, everything becomes simpler to maintain.

bullets.title: Immediate difference
bullets.description: Clearer, cleaner, and more presentable straight away.

bullets.title: Easier upkeep next
bullets.description: Less catch-up work week to week.

bullets.title: Straightforward quote
bullets.description: Clear scope and a tidy finish you can see.

faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: When should I book a seasonal cleanup?
items.answer: Spring and autumn are common, but it depends on your garden. Tell us what you want achieved and we’ll advise.

items.question: What’s included in a cleanup?
items.answer: Usually clearing, tidying beds, light pruning/cut back, edges, and a clean finish. We’ll confirm in your quote.

items.question: Do you remove waste?
items.answer: Yes—waste removal can be included. Let us know what you want taken away.

items.question: Can this be a one-off job?
items.answer: Yes—seasonal cleanups are commonly one-off resets.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Want a proper garden reset for the season?
finalCta.description: Tell us what needs clearing and we’ll recommend a practical plan—then quote it clearly.
